Module com.cab302.wellbeing.model
Package com.cab302.wellbeing.controller

Class ReportController

java.lang.Object
com.cab302.wellbeing.controller.ReportController
public class ReportController extends Object
This class is responsible for controlling the report functionality in the application. It provides functionalities such as displaying the daily usage and website usage reports.
